name: test_e2e_with_logs[515_FP_CRLF_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `FP_CRLF_001` |
| **Name** | Normal URL with newline in parameter |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | false_positive |
| **Severity** | `INFO` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/search?q=hello%0aworld`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dhello%0aworld`
- **Expected Detection**: No

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `FAILED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Expected Not Detected |
